name: Smile? - Endless Runner Game
description:
This is an infinite endless runner game (Thats obvious lol) where you play for a smile circle kinda player who has to avoid enemies that will spawn on his way. The only question is, should you smile or fear? 

Donate ====> Every amount of money will be appreciated. Donation will help me                                        with other projects and maybe publishing game on Steam :D

More info==> Will be on Twitter or Youtube: 

Twitter:  https://twitter.com/auste_the

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCsMs9SxdTTwg1fdqLQY0oQQ
